dmca.title: Oracle claims Google Groups post misappropriates trade secrets
dmca.body:
I write on behalf of Oracle USA, Inc. ("Oracle"). We request that the above-referenced message and any related postings be removed from the comp.databases.oracle.server group on the Google Web site IMMEDIATELY in order to protect Oracle's intellectual property rights. 

The individual who posted this information is a former Oracle employee. THE INFORMATION IN THIS MESSAGE CONSTITUTES AN ORACLE PROPRIETARY TRADE SECRET AND ITS CONTINUED AVAILABILITY ON THE GOOGLE ARCHIVES WILL CAUSE SERIOUS, IRREPARABLE DAMAGE TO ORACLE. 

For your information, we have also contacted Google separately regarding another unlawful message posted by the same individual.

Please contact me at [private] as soon as possible. We appreciate your cooperation in this very urgent matter.

Very truly yours,

[Private]
Senior Corporate Counsel
Oracle Legal Department
